item.description:
Come see the Providence Bruins Hockey Team trounce on that Portland Pirates (boo, they beat the Bruins in the playoffs last year).

Game start is 7:05 PM. Dinner before the game at Finnegan's Wake at 5:30. If you can't make it there, meet in the lobby of The Dunk!

I can get the tickets at $25 per pair using, ordinarily tickets are that price per. I absolutely must have solid commitment by Nov. 17, when I will order the tickets.

And to top it all off, it will be T-Shirt Night, first 2000 entrants get a Providence Bruins T-Shirt...what a deal!

I accept Paypal, or you can pay me when you pick up your ticket!
item.how_to_find_us: Finnegan's Wake @ 5:30 or in the The Dunk lobby at 6:45
item.name: Providence Bruins vs. Portland Pirates
